A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson's movie is a mess. His interpretation of Luke Skywalker is awful and makes no sense. The cantina scene is completely useless and is basically just to give Finn something to do. There are some fun things in the movie\, but overall it is a mess and will leave long-time Star Wars fans feeling unsatisfied. It's a shame and alarming that Disney is trusting Johnson with the next trilogy.
